SELECT LNO as no, TITLE, CONT as contents, SDT as startDate, EDT as endDate, TOT_HR as totalHours, DAY_HR as dayHours, MNO as ownerNo FROM LESSON WHERE LNO=#{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE LESSON SET TITLE=#{title}, CONT=#{contents}, SDT=#{startDate}, EDT=#{endDate}, TOT_HR=#{totalHours}, DAY_HR=#{dayHours}, MNO=#{ownerNo} WHERE LNO=#{no}
